creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: orange synthetic brocade body; long dress with long dark pink brocade sleeves with bright turquoise cuffs; very low V-neck opening; tiers of black, white and pale green rickrack and blue, white and black netting edging at skirt; same trims around bodice; bodice lined in plaid cotton
title: Dress (rob tahura)
